SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.endpoints

Class ApiEndpointUtils

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.endpoints.ApiEndpointUtils
public final class ApiEndpointUtils extends Object
Utility methods shared across API endpoint handlers.

Provides common functionality for request parsing, response formatting, file handling, and JSON serialization used by multiple handlers.

    • getGson

      Returns:
      Gson instance configured for session serialization.

    • getGsonSimple

      Returns the simple Gson instance for general parsing.
      Returns:
      Gson instance without exclusion strategy.

    • readBody

      public static String readBody(InputStream is) throws IOException
      Reads the full request body into a string using UTF-8 encoding.
      Parameters:
      is - Input stream of the request body.
      Returns:
      String content of the request body.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading.

    • parseQuery

      public static Map<String,String> parseQuery(URI uri)
      Parses the query string from a URI into a map of key-value pairs.
      Parameters:
      uri - Request URI.
      Returns:
      Map of query parameter names to values.

      s - Encoded string.

      Builds a CaseConfig from a parsed JSON map.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • isRawUploadRequest

      public static boolean isRawUploadRequest(HttpExchange exchange)
      Checks if the request is a raw file upload based on Content-Type header.
      Parameters:
      exchange - HTTP exchange to check.
      Returns:
      true if the request is multipart/form-data, message/rfc822, or application/octet-stream.

    • parseRecipients

      public static List<String> parseRecipients(String input)
      Parses a comma-separated list of recipients.
      Parameters:
      input - Comma-separated recipient addresses.
      Returns:
      List of trimmed, non-blank recipient addresses.

    • readUploadedEmlBytes

      public static byte[] readUploadedEmlBytes(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Reads uploaded EML bytes from the request, handling multipart form-data if needed.
      Parameters:
      exchange - HTTP exchange containing the upload.
      Returns:
      Byte array of the uploaded EML content.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading.

    • extractMultipartBoundary

      public static String extractMultipartBoundary(String contentType)
      Extracts the boundary string from a multipart/form-data Content-Type header.
      Parameters:
      contentType - Content-Type header value.
      Returns:
      Boundary string, or null if not found.

    • extractMultipartFileBytes

      public static byte[] extractMultipartFileBytes(byte[] multipartBody, String boundary)
      Extracts file content from a multipart/form-data body.
      Parameters:
      multipartBody - Raw multipart body bytes.
      boundary - Multipart boundary string.
      Returns:
      File content bytes, or null if no file part found.

    • persistUploadedEml

      public static String persistUploadedEml(String sender, byte[] emlBytes, String requestedFileName) throws IOException
      Persists an uploaded EML file to storage.
      Parameters:
      sender - Sender email address.
      emlBytes - EML content bytes.
      requestedFileName - Optional requested filename.
      Returns:
      Path to the persisted file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while writing.

    • normalizeUploadFileName

      public static String normalizeUploadFileName(String requested)
      Normalizes an upload filename to ensure it is safe and has .eml extension.
      Parameters:
      requested - Requested filename (may be null or contain path).
      Returns:
      Normalized safe filename with .eml extension.

    • escapeJson

      public static String escapeJson(String s)
      Escapes a string for safe inclusion in JSON.
      Parameters:
      s - String to escape.
      Returns:
      Escaped string with backslashes and quotes escaped.

    • escapeHtml

      public static String escapeHtml(String s)
      Escapes minimal HTML characters for safe inclusion in HTML content.
      Parameters:
      s - String to escape.
      Returns:
      Escaped string with HTML special characters replaced.

    • parseJsonBody

      public static Map<String,Object> parseJsonBody(InputStream is) throws IOException
      Parses the JSON body of a request into a map.
      Parameters:
      is - Input stream of the request body.
      Returns:
      Parsed map of JSON properties, or empty map if body is blank.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the JSON body is invalid.

      public static List<String> toStringList(Object value)
      Converts an object to a list of strings.
      Parameters:
      value - Object to convert (expected to be a List).
      Returns:
      List of strings, or empty list if value is not a List.

    • toInt

      public static int toInt(Object value, int fallback)
      Converts an object to an integer value.
      Parameters:
      value - Object to convert (Number, String, or other).
      fallback - Default value if conversion fails.
      Returns:
      Integer value, or fallback if value is null or cannot be parsed.

    • acceptsJson

      public static boolean acceptsJson(HttpExchange exchange)
      Checks if the request accepts JSON responses based on the Accept header.
      Parameters:
      exchange - HTTP exchange to check.
      Returns:
      true if the Accept header contains "application/json".
